description:
Witnesses report a huge snake monster in a dungeon near the city. The king sends the cadets to investigate. However, Alka, Micona, and the mysterious man Sou all get involved for their own reasons.
Source: Funimation

titles.title: Suppose You Visited an Early Dungeon but Encountered Three Final Bosses?
Tatoeba Joban no Dungeon ni Dekakete Ittara Last Boss ga 3 Nin Ita You na Tenkai
たとえば序盤のダンジョンに出かけて行ったらラスボスが3人いたような展開
